mapper.update: update sys_receipt set chip = chip + #{chip}, cash = cash + #{cash}, insurance = insurance + #{insurance}, win = win + #{cash} + #{chip}, insurance_win = insurance_win + #{insurance}, water = water + #{water}, update_time = sysdate() where id = #{id}

update sys_receipt set chip_th = chip_th + #{chip}, cash_th = cash_th + #{cash}, insurance_th = insurance_th + #{insurance}, win_th = win_th + #{cash} + #{chip}, insurance_win_th = insurance_win_th + #{insurance}, water_th = water_th + #{water}, update_time = sysdate() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(s.version) minVersion, MAX(s.version) maxVersion, s.table_id tableId FROM sys_table_management s WHERE s.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY s.table_id

SELECT m.card as card, m.`name` as name, date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, ifnull(SUM(case when type in (0,1,4) then b.win_lose else 0 end), 0) as winLose, (select ifnull(SUM(case when type in (0,1,4) then a.win_lose else 0 end), 0) from sys_bet_info a WHERE date_format(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and a.card = b.card) as sumWinLose, ifnull(SUM(case when type in(0,1,4) then b.water else 0 end), 0) as water, (select ifnull(SUM(case when type in(0,1,4) then a.water else 0 end), 0) from sys_bet_info a WHERE date_format(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and a.card = b.card) as sumWater,
ifnull(SUM(case when type in (2,3,5) then b.win_lose else 0 end), 0) as winLoseTh, (select ifnull(SUM(case when type in (2,3,5) then a.win_lose else 0 end), 0) from sys_bet_info a WHERE date_format(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and a.card = b.card) as sumWinLoseTh, ifnull(SUM(case when type in (2,3,5) then b.water else 0 end), 0) as waterTh, (select ifnull(SUM(case when type in (2,3,5) then a.water else 0 end), 0) from sys_bet_info a WHERE date_format(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') and a.card = b.card) as sumWaterTh FROM sys_bet_info b LEFT JOIN sys_members m ON m.card = b.card
AND b.card = #{reportSearch.card}
and (
( b.version >= #{item.minVersion} AND b.version <= #{item.maxVersion} AND b.table_id = #{item.tableId} )
)
GROUP BY m.card,date_format(b.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_format(b.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') desc
